p: The test groups, 5% and 10% hexane hydrogel (group 3 and group 4), showed normal epidermis with minimal inflammation in the upper dermis and regeneration of epidermis forming knots of squamous cells. The examination of histopathology revealed that the original regeneration of tissue was much more significant on test group 5% and 10% hexane hydrogel as compared to control as well as standard.
